results.title: Moon warriors [Widescreen]
results.creator_credit: Team Work Production House and Samo Hung
results.brief_description: Simple fisherman Fei (Andy Lau) finds himself caught up in an extraordinary situation after assisting fugitive Prince (Kenny Bee) and his bodyguard Hsien (Maggie Cheung) after they have been ambushed in the forest near his home. Unaware of their identities at first, he invites them to take refuge in his village, where he learns of the conflict that has driven the Prince into fleeing his ancestral home. The Prince, appreciative of Fei’s skill with a sword, asks him to accompany Hsien on a mission to rescue his betrothed, Princess Yuen (Anita Mui), and her father, the Emperor Lan-Ning Kwan. When they reach the Emperor and his daughter, they are confronted by a calculated surprise attack that leaves almost everyone except dead. A tangled web begins to unravel amidst the chaos, uncovering the devastating truth. An epic, atmospheric tale of rivalry, betrayal and revenge from legendary director Samo Hung, internationally renowned for creating original and aggressively acrobatic fight scenes in Hong Kong action films. In Cantonese with English subtitles.

results.title: Moon shot
results.creator_credit: TBS, Varied Directions International and Kirk Woltinger
results.brief_description: Share the excitement, drama, passion and power of this landmark event in this fascinating program. Utilising an untapped treasure of NASA tapes, home movies, and never-before-seen footage of the Soviet space program, astronauts Alan Shepard and Deke Slayton guide the viewer through the real story behind the space program. Re-live the historical moments of Joh Glenn’s breathtaking orbit, Apollo 11’s 1969 moon landing and the tragic Apollo 1 fire. Share the magic once again in this inspiring celebration of mankind’s greatest achievement.

results.title: Moon over Miami
results.creator_credit: Harry Joe Brown, Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation and Walter Lang
results.brief_description: When two sisters (played by Betty Grable and Carole Landis) fail to receive an expected inheritance, they decide to pool their resources with their Aunt and head for Florida, posing as an heiress, a secretary and a maid in the hopes of ensnaring a couple of millionaires. Grable is soon involved with two, Don Ameche and Robert Cummings, but all is not what it seems. Ameche is just as broke as the girls, but woos gold-digger Grable with his smooth talk and charming ways, with genuine millionaire Cummings in hot pursuit. A bright and breezy song-filled musical, as Grable turns in some fine dance routines with the Condos Brothers. Fabulous comic performances from the cast help make this film one of the best Hollywood musicals of its era.

results.title: Moon man (K)
results.creator_credit: Kratky Film, Weston Woods Studios, Zdenka Deitchova, Morton Schindel and Gene Deitch
results.brief_description: Animated version of the children’s book by Tomi Ungerer, which tells of the adventures that befell a man from the moon. Bored with his lonely life on the Moon, he decides to join the fun on Earth.

results.title: Moon gates
results.brief_description: Separate images in red, blue and yellow of dancers using kinetic sculptures are combined with classical music to give a surreal and atmospheric visual image in this Doris Chase film. Choreographer: Mary Staton. Music: George Kleinsinger

results.title: Moon's men
results.brief_description: Without commentary, tells of the early morning shrimp fishing at Morecambe Bay, on the north-west coast of England. When the tide goes out, two men harness their well-fed mares, ride in a wooden wagon to the water and gather their nets filled with fish.

results.title: Moomba belonged to my grandfather
results.brief_description: Moomba belonged to my grandfather, Tom Wittingslow. Of all the shows and carnivals we did all over Australia, Moomba was the best. A digital story created to celebrate 50 years of Melbourne Moomba Water Festival.

results.title: Moom
results.brief_description: Mum and I would laugh at how the Moomba festival was named after our deadly mooms. Moom refers to our bottoms. A digital story created to celebrate 50 years of Melbourne Moomba Water Fest.
